mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order_his ( order_id, user_id, `status`, order_code, order_name, empty_box_order_time, empty_box_call_name, empty_box_call_phone, empty_box_call_address, empty_box_call_time, empty_box_call_interval, heavy_box_order_time, heavy_box_call_name, heavy_box_call_phone, heavy_box_call_address, heavy_box_call_time, heavy_box_call_interval, box_id, box_code, box_standard, box_unit_price, lease_duration, total_price, sort_no, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, version, del_flag, app_del_flag, backend_del_flag) SELECT id as order_id, user_id, `status`, order_code, order_name, empty_box_order_time, empty_box_call_name, empty_box_call_phone, empty_box_call_address, empty_box_call_time, empty_box_call_interval, heavy_box_order_time, heavy_box_call_name, heavy_box_call_phone, heavy_box_call_address, heavy_box_call_time, heavy_box_call_interval, box_id, box_code, box_standard, box_unit_price, lease_duration, total_price, sort_no, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, version, del_flag, app_del_flag, backend_del_flag from t_order where id = #{id}
